title: Essence
description: A music recommendation engine that captures a user's emotional resonance and aligns it with songs using multi-label emotion classification and poetic emotional profiling.

title: ShiftOS (Concept)
description: A futuristic thin-client OS that boots into the cloud with premium I/O and aesthetic freedom. Users can choose computing environments (Windows, ML, Gaming) at boot.

title: Cosmic Ray Pattern Analysis (ML Research)
description: A machine learning research initiative focused on uncovering patterns in cosmic ray interactions, with future applications in space weather forecasting and anomaly detection.

title: Medium Blog Series: Tech Meets Soul
description: A growing library of reflective and technical writing on machine learning, symbolism in AI, and emotionally intelligent systems.
